# tsuru_router (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "tsuru_router"  "test_router"   {
	name = "test_router"
	type = "router"
	readiness_gates = ["gate1", "gate2"]
	config = <<-EOT
	url: "testing"
	headers:
	  "x-my-header": test
	EOT
}
```

### Required

* `name` - (String).
* `type` - (String).


### Optional

* `config` - (String) Configuration for router in YAML format.
* `id` - (String) The ID of this resource..
